title: FK Chain
content:
Here is a _Bike Chain_ inspired Font thrown into the World Wide Web, because it has been lying around for way to long on the HD.  
 [http://typophile.com/files/3844795005\_d84460acb4\_o.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415031142/http:/typophile.com/files/3844795005_d84460acb4_o.jpg "http://typophile.com/files/3844795005\_d84460acb4\_o.jpg")  
For direkt download and personal use:  
 [http://www.unitedstatesoftheart.com/download\_files/090821\_jum\_FKChain.zip](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415031142/http:/www.unitedstatesoftheart.com/download_files/090821_jum_FKChain.zip)  
I would like to hear what you think. Cheers,  
Jum

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [3844795005\_d84460acb4\_o.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415031142/http:/typophile.com/files/3844795005_d84460acb4_o.jpg) | 362.18 KB |
author: jum

comments.content: This is awesome. I assume it will be showing up on bike shop signs everywhere soon. :)
I can see it on a music CD. Grime, garage or Hiphop

Both would be great, but even 8.000+ downloads only on [_DaFont.com_](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415031142/http:/www.dafont.com/fk-chain.font) cannot convince someone to write me a note if it has been used at all ;) Anyways, thanks for your kind words!
